articles.title: Kelly Clarkson admits to using weight loss drug after losing 60 pounds - New York Post
articles.description: While the “American Idol” alum didn’t disclose the name of the weight loss drug she’s been taking, she insisted it was not Ozempic.
articles.content:
Kelly Clarkson has credited a weight loss drug for her slimmed-down frame.
While chatting with Whoopi Goldberg, who recently lost weight with the help of the Type II diabetes weight loss drug Mounja… [+2417 chars]

articles.title: Diamond giant De Beers faces spin-off amid wider restructuring as Anglo American takeover pressure mounts - CNBC
articles.description: Anglo American shares fell over 3% early Tuesday after it announced plans to spin off its highly prized De Beers diamond business.
articles.content: Anglo American plans to spin off its highly prized De Beers diamond unit as part of a sweeping restructuring of its 107-year-old business as it seeks to fend off persistent takeover bids from mining … [+2960 chars]
